scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- bun next dev
scripts.generate:importmap:production: NODE_ENV=production bunx dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload generate:importmap
scripts.build: bun run generate:importmap:production && NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- bun next build
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- bun next start
scripts.test:ci: bun run test:static && bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration:all && bun run test:e2e:essential && bun run test:stats
scripts.test:static: bunx tsc --noEmit && bun run lint && bun run check && bun run analyze:circular && bun run analyze:duplication && bun run analyze:unused
scripts.test:unit: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/unit --exclude src/__tests__/unit/bundle-size.test.ts --exclude src/__tests__/unit/payload-client.test.ts --exclude src/__tests__/unit/pagination.test.tsx
scripts.test:unit:extended: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/unit/bundle-size.test.ts src/__tests__/unit/pagination.test.tsx
scripts.test:coverage:unit: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run --coverage --exclude 'src/__tests__/unit/payload-client.test.ts' --exclude 'src/__tests__/unit/bundle-size.test.ts' --exclude 'src/__tests__/unit/pagination.test.tsx' src/__tests__/unit
scripts.test:integration:payload-client: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/payload-client.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:posts: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/posts.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:collections-posts: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/collections-posts.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:collections-users: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/collections-users.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:collections-media: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/collections-media.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:performance: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration/performance.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:all: bun run test:db:up && bun run test:migrate && dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run src/__tests__/integration; EXIT=$?; bun run test:db:down; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:coverage:integration: bun run test:integration:payload-client && bun run test:integration:posts && bun run test:integration:collections-posts && bun run test:integration:collections-users && bun run test:integration:collections-media && bun run test:integration:performance
scripts.test:coverage:unit:layered: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run --coverage --coverage.reporter=json --coverage.reporter=html --coverage.reporter=text
scripts.test:coverage:all: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- vitest run --coverage
scripts.test:e2e:essential: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- bunx playwright test tests/e2e/*-essential.spec.ts --reporter=github
scripts.test:e2e:full: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- bunx playwright test tests/e2e --reporter=github
scripts.test:migrate: dotenvx run -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload migrate
scripts.analyze:unused: knip || echo 'Knip found unused items (acceptable for performance test utilities)'
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:deps && npm run analyze:duplication || true && npm run analyze:unused
scripts.env:encrypt: dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env && dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env.development && dotenvx encrypt -f projects/.env.production
scripts.env:decrypt: dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env && dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env.development && dotenvx decrypt -f projects/.env.production
scripts.env:rotate: dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env && dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env.development && dotenvx rotate -f projects/.env.production
scripts.env:genexample: dotenvx ext genexample -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -f projects/.env.production -o projects/.env.example
scripts.payload:migrate: NODE_ENV=production dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.production -- payload migrate
scripts.generate:types: dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -- cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload generate:types
scripts.generate:importmap: dotenvx run -f projects/.env -f projects/.env.development -- cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --import tsx" PAYLOAD_CONFIG_PATH=src/payload.config.ts payload generate:importmap
